Summary: I heard what I thought was fluttering or crackling in the tree behind me. Turned around to see orb take off from tree.
divs: sighting detailsi was standing in my driveway talking to a friend who was sitting in her car with the door open. it was approximately 7;00 pm, it had been raining somewhat ( but not at the time of this event ) and there were thunderstorms in the area. i heard, from behind me, what i thought was a bird fluttering in the tree that kind of sounded like electrical crackling also. the tree was about 15 ft behind where i was standing. i turned around to look at what was causing the noise. as i turned a white ball came out of the tree and traveled away from us at a very great rate speed across the street over the house across the street and disappeared from sight. there was a definite curvature to its flight path as it flew away as it looked to avoid the trees across the street. the person who i was talking to also witnessed this event. i have never seen anything like it before or since. the entire event lasted no more than 15 seconds. i got a little excited and asked my friend if she had seen it and she said that she had and we wondered what the heck it was. at the time i wrote it off to ball lightning as i had heard it can occur when thunderstorms are around but was watching your today ( 4\19\12 ) show about orbs and it reminded me of this event.
